author: Baron Unread
install_msg: Barons Discord Cogs suite installed! Enhance your server with moderation, automation, and utility tools.
name: barons-discord-cogs
short: A collection of Discord server management cogs.
description: A suite of Discord cogs for moderation, automation, and server utilities. Includes antispam, autorole, regfilter, replypin, and voicerole for a better server experience.
